alert.note: Alert for Umatilla (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 06 at 4:39PM PDT until May 06 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: .Rain is forecast to continue this weekend across northeast Oregon. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Minor flooding possible due to release of water from Mckay Reservoir. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Oregon, including the following county, Umatilla. Minor flooding is possible along Mckay Creek from the dam to the Umatilla River. * WHEN...Until 430 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 439 PM PDT, Showers will continue across the area tonight and Saturday. - Flow release from Mckay Dam will remain around 800 cfs until further notice. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pendleton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
